column1: Our thoughts & prayers are with those who are unable to spend Thanksgiving with their loved ones this year. Even in these unprecedented times we as Americans are truly blessed & have much to be thankful for. Vivien the kids & I wish everyone a very happy & safe Thanksgiving. https://t.co/yvUCtp1JLa

Thank you to @GovKemp his team & our local & state officials for their hard work to earn this recognition. While we still have a lot of work to do to recover from COVID-19 & get our state & country back on track this is excellent news & positions GA to recover more quickly.

Georgia has been named the #1 state to do business for the 8th year in a row. This announcement coincides with the state remaining on a record pace for economic development investments and job creation during fiscal year 2021. https://t.co/CSdlxP4WVk

Honored to be with #GA08 veterans in Tifton this morning to celebrate #VeteransDay. As your Representative it’s an honor to serve so many who’ve sacrificed so much for our country. We’re thankful for your service not only today but each & every day. May God bless our veterans. https://t.co/J9ffmfLqCL
Since 1775 Marines have served our nation with pride and distinction. Today we honor their service and celebrate 245 years of the @USMC. #SemperFi #MarineCorpsBirthday https://t.co/uyMiV7VAwc
Ensuring the integrity of our election is of the utmost importance and I’m working to ensure transparency and fairness in the ballot counting process. We must protect the integrity of the vote!

This week is National Veterans Small Business Week & @SBAgov is hosting virtual events for veteran-owned small business. You can find a full slate of events on their website by clicking here: https://t.co/oaQaiGYE8L. God Bless our nation’s veterans. #VetBiz https://t.co/ZBrSemrmCy

Yesterday @EPAAWheeler and @GaDeptAg signed a MOU in conjunction with @EPA's announcement to allow new dicamba registrations for cotton and soybeans. This move balances environmental concerns while giving farmers more certainty. You can read more here: https://t.co/MFEdL10umc https://t.co/91t7WzXHUO

Throughout the confirmation process she showed her poise thoughtfulness & intelligence & I know she’ll bring those qualities to the bench & continue the Court’s important work to protect the rights of every American & uphold the Constitution. Congratulations Justice Barrett. https://t.co/QHrOUNWc2F

The #PaycheckProtectionProgram has been a lifeline for millions of small businesses during the COVID-19 pandemic but @SpeakerPelosi & @HouseDemocrats are more concerned with not giving @realDonaldTrump a “win” before the election than supporting Americans in need. https://t.co/CKNuyBaqK5

My district office staff is available to discuss Medicare Part D options. You can call our Tifton office at 229- 396-5175 or Warner Robins office at 478-971-1776 to schedule an appointment. We're happy to work with you to find the Part D plan that best suits your needs. #GA08 https://t.co/8Ky4jlest2

India represents a largely untapped market for many American farm products such as pecans. That's why I am pressing @USTradeRep to negotiate lowering India's disproportionately high tariff on pecans to help our American farmers gain more market access. https://t.co/nMSwl5aFvw

For 245 yrs @USNavy has brought peace security & humanitarian relief to regions around the world w/ a tradition of honor courage & commitment. It's an honor to serve on @HASCRepublicans to support their important missions & the brave Sailors who protect our nation. #Navy245 https://t.co/MNJUcOK8dT

Independent reporting has shown that the allegations against Irwin Co. Detention Center & @ICEgov are at best exaggerated. Dems should be embarrassed spreading these allegations before the investigation is complete. They don't want the facts to come out. https://t.co/WZrwUAdPDH

Tomorrow (10/2) at 4PM ET Paul Lawrence Under Secretary For Benefits at @DeptVetAffairs will host a call with Georgia veterans and their families to discuss COVID-19 resources the Blue Water Navy Act and the Solid Start program. You can join the call at 833-380-0417. #GA08 https://t.co/hG6DsVRia9

For years GA farmers have been negatively impacted by unfair trading practices especially our fruit & veggie growers. @realDonaldTrump's Administration has been committed to supporting our farmers & I commend this move to request an investigation. https://t.co/kIMMEIkMqE

Had a great call this morning with @UnitedFresh to discus ways to help the industry weather impacts of COVID-19 remedies for unfair trade practices & encouraging retailers to buy American produce. I remain committed to our farmers & helping them through these difficult times. https://t.co/8IaGxb8qvJ

House Democrats are more concerned with not giving @realDonaldTrump a "win" before the election than doing their job to support American small businesses during these unprecedented times. #FightForSmallBiz

Last night I joined several of my colleagues in signing @HerreraBeutler's discharge petition to circumvent Speaker Pelosi's political games & trigger automatic consideration of the #PaycheckProtectionProgram Extension Act which the Speaker refuses to bring to the floor.

I commend @realDonaldTrump for nominating Amy Coney Barrett to our nation’s highest court. She is an exemplary jurist committed to our Constitution and an extraordinary woman mother and American. She deserves a fair and swift confirmation process in the Senate.

I appreciate @ConawayTX11 for his leadership on this legislation which will help us better understand emerging technologies like #blockchain and for his continued focus to promote public policy that fosters rather than inhibits growth of #FinTech in the United States. https://t.co/Xqq2vPNaaI

Great to join @GAChamber again today for their agriculture trade & rural initiatives panel. One of the most important things #RuralAmerica can do right now is complete the Census. The deadline is 9/30. It only takes a few minutes: https://t.co/3TEED0h4Kl or 844-330-2020. #GA08 https://t.co/vKytF365fC

I appreciate @GAChamber hosting & LTG Smith joining me in an important discussion on GA's military installations defense communities & Active Duty Guard Reserve & civilian workforce across the state. We covered economic development services for mil families & much more. https://t.co/JEznrU4m4x

In the @HouseDemocrats CR @SpeakerPelosi shamefully excludes key resources for American farm families including CCC funding that is used to fund Farm Bill programs. Now is not the time to play partisan games with our nation’s food security.

Ruth Bader Ginsburg served our nation on its highest Court for nearly 30 years and we remember Justice Ginsburg for her life of service to our country and pray for her family and friends who are grieving during this difficult time.

For 73 yrs the @usairforce has brought strength power & protection to skies around the world. To our Airmen at Robins & Moody Air Force Bases in #GA08 & all U.S. Airmen here at home & around the world: Thank you for your dedication & service to our great nation. #AIRPOWER https://t.co/67WqLTlvXY

Thank you @ConawayTX11 for your steadfast commitment to America's farmers our nation's agriculture and ag research industries and the members of @HouseAgGOP that you have led since 2015. Vivien and I wish you Suzanne and your family the best in your next chapter. https://t.co/OEkTsdQFx4

Today on National POW/MIA Recognition Day we pause to recognize and express our gratitude for the sacrifices of our nation's prisoners of war (POW) and missing in action (MIA). They are never forgotten. We will never forget. #POWMIARecognitionDay https://t.co/vhiue7AT4b

This historic achievement is decades in the making and could not have happened without the steadfast commitment of @realDonaldTrump and his Administration. I look forward to this agreement serving as the basis for wider peace and security negotiations throughout the region. (2/2)

Today I had the opportunity to join @realDonaldTrump at the @WhiteHouse for the signing of the historic Abraham Accords which normalize the United Arab Emirates’ and Bahrain’s relations with Israel. (1/2) https://t.co/aPuTyGjlqx

We have reached out to DHS and ICE and they have assured us that they take all allegations seriously and are firmly committed to the safety and welfare of all those in their custody. We will continue to be in contact with them as they investigate these claims. (2/2)
My office is aware of the whistleblower complaint at the Irwin County Detention Center that was filed with the U.S. Department of Homeland Security Office of the Inspector General. (1/2)

As your Representative in Congress each year I have the privilege of nominating a limited number of students to 4 of the 5 U.S. Service Academies. Completed applications for my office are due 10/23 and can be requested through the link below. #GA08 https://t.co/1yKXyuu2bI

This image is of the Pentagon 9/11 Memorial a moving tribute to the 184 people who died there. If you’re ever in DC I’d encourage you to visit this place & honor the nearly 3000 people who perished on 9/11 in VA NYC & PA. While they are gone they are never forgotten. https://t.co/LyT08VTLPh

Nineteen years later we continue to pray for those who lost their lives on 9/11 & their loved ones who are forever changed by this national tragedy. We also recognize the countless first responders & everyday people who rushed towards the devastation to help. #NeverForget https://t.co/WDKYTu1YUe

Please share this post with your friends family employees coworkers and neighbors because your response to the #2020Census matters and shapes the future of our communities for years to come. #GA08 https://t.co/6sjP1QYQnR

I encourage every Georgian to take the #2020Census. Your responses are safe secure and only used to produce statistics. This data helps determine how much federal funding our communities receive for everything from schools to economic development. https://t.co/3TEED0h4Kl

Seventy-five years ago today victory was declared over Japan marking the end of World War II. We are forever grateful to those who fought for freedom and liberty around the world. God Bless the Greatest Generation. #VJDay https://t.co/GUvbDZjmtK
I also encourage Americans to purchase American-grown farm products whenever possible to support our growers especially in these unprecedented times. (7/7)

America’s grocery retailers are posting record profits while American farm revenues are at record lows. Retailers have the responsibility to stop stocking products from countries that engage in unfair trade practices against the American farm family. (6/7)
While I look forward to seeing the positive impacts of this report & working with the Administration to implement these new steps there is also a burden on American retailers. (5/7)

For too long countries like Mexico have taken advantage of loopholes in our trade agreements & flooded our domestic markets with cheap government-subsidized produce at prices below the cost of production causing serious financial injury to American growers. (4/7)
I thank @realDonaldTrump @USTradeRep @SecretarySonny and @SecretaryRoss for their ongoing commitment to addressing our concerns & creating a more level playing field for American producers. (3/7)

This report comes after USTR hosted virtual hearings in August with fruit & vegetable growers from GA & FL which were the result of years of bipartisan work by members of our Congressional Delegations. You can read the full report here: https://t.co/EpQaVZtz6M (2/7)

The Office of the @USTradeRep @USDA and @CommerceGov have released a report outlining the Trump Administration’s plan to address the threat posed by increased foreign imports to American producers of seasonal and perishable fruits and vegetables. (1/7)

Today at 9 AM I will testify at a virtual hearing hosted by @USTradeRep to discuss the impacts of unfair trade practices on GA’s fruit & vegetable growers & the need to protect our domestic supply chain. You can click the link below to learn more & watch. https://t.co/Yzsycqt2Jg

If you haven’t done so yet I’d encourage you to take a few minutes to complete the #2020Census. It is vitally important that each Georgian is counted and heard. You can learn more or take the 2020 Census at https://t.co/o0l2pgxsAt. #GA08 https://t.co/C2KoyWRTzq

On August 1 Richey Seaton longtime Executive Director of the Georgia Cotton Commission retired after nearly 26 years of service. We wish him & his family the best in their next chapter & we welcome Taylor Sills as the next GCC Executive Director. https://t.co/oAbMnKUL1i

For their sacrifices I've been working to ensure combat wounded total & permanently disabled veterans have the opportunity to continue to excel in the workforce without forcing them to surrender their SSDI benefits. You can learn more on H.R. 2655 here: https://t.co/rOPhwbrhaH

Today is #PurpleHeartDay a time to remember & honor the sacrifices made by Purple Heart veterans & all members of our armed forces. This award given to those wounded in combat or who lost their lives in defense of our nation represents courage sacrifice commitment & heart. https://t.co/NwurJ3oVev

I’d like to extend a special congratulations to Gen. CQ Brown the new @usairforce Chief of Staff. Gen. Brown brings nearly 35 yrs of experience to the role and I look forward to working with him in his new capacity. https://t.co/6dNZoJnriq

Supporting rural hospitals and health care facilities during the COVID-19 outbreak has been a key priority of mine. That's why I introduced the Assistance for Rural Health Safety and Educational Facilities Act (H.R. 7758). You can learn more here: https://t.co/FSgQ8DW04N

Earlier this week @realDonaldTrump signed an executive order to enhance telehealth services in #RuralAmerica. This will not only improve care and treatment options for our rural communities now but it'll also positively impact them for years to come. https://t.co/8Wa9I9D2Jc

For 230 years the U.S. Coast Guard has performed the important mission of America's maritime first responder protecting our country's vital economic national and border security. They embody the very best of "Always Ready" and we celebrate them today. #SemperParatus https://t.co/BCPNSN35Av

Our prayers & condolences are with the family & friends of Herman Cain who passed yesterday. Herman exemplified the American dream & was a conservative voice in Georgia for decades. He will be greatly missed by many in our state & across the country. https://t.co/RMvy8QP00V

Today I had the honor of paying final respects to Rep. John Lewis at his funeral in Atlanta. It was a moving tribute to a great Georgian. John was a good and godly man. His legacy will live on and inspire generations to come. Our prayers remain with his family and loved ones. https://t.co/vR2QYViOP4

On August 4 the new Valdosta VA Community Based Outpatient Clinic will begin seeing patients. The opening of this new clinic has been a priority of mine for several years and I'm very glad to see this facility finally come to life to better serve our veterans in South GA. #GA08 https://t.co/PJMxL8G7OQ

John Lewis spent his life promoting equal rights fighting racism & working to make our country a better place for all Americans. He was a good man & he will be greatly missed. We extend to his family & loved ones our condolences during this difficult time. Rest In Peace John. https://t.co/JR0sHusWd7

.@realDonaldTrump was right to reject Communist China’s illegal claims in the South China Sea. Another example of cleaning up after the previous Administration’s policy of appeasement towards China. https://t.co/E6hZOWLtoh

Big news for Middle GA: @Fritolay announced that they are planning a $200M expansion in Perry & Kathleen that will create 120 new jobs. This expansion will also make the Perry facility one of the company’s largest plants in the world. #GA08 https://t.co/BhVvUUj7TG

Today the Supreme Court ruled that the Little Sisters of the Poor are exempt from Affordable Care Act mandates that went against their religious beliefs. This is a big win for faith-based institutions religious liberty and upholding the First Amendment. https://t.co/SQk3FGKQYy
Land of the free because of the brave! Happy #July4th from our family to yours. https://t.co/XjBRXrhapV

Earlier this morning I joined @FoxFriendsFirst to talk about the defense authorization bill which passed out of the House Armed Services committee late last night. You can watch the full interview here: https://t.co/7O7Qw8F6Y6
... Americans need comprehensive legislation that addresses the critical transportation and infrastructure needs our country faces not more partisan wish-list programs from Speaker Pelosi.

... America’s roads and bridges are crumbling and bipartisan solutions to address serious issues impacting our country including my amendment to ease regulatory burdens on agricultural truckers were not included....
... The bill’s prioritization of expensive green programs and stifling traditional infrastructure investment will leave countless communities behind including many in rural America....
The House just passed a $1.5 trillion infrastructure bill that reduces a state’s flexibility to invest in infrastructure and limits building new roads and bridges....

The deadline to apply for @SBAgov's Paycheck Protection Program is June 30. PPP has been a lifeline for millions of small businesses keeping doors open & Americans on payroll during the COVID-19 outbreak.   Small businesses looking for info should visit https://t.co/QRlzPxi6ji. https://t.co/8v8PfTWbXB

I appreciate the @macon_chamber inviting me to join a virtual meeting with Middle GA business & community leaders this morning. We discussed the congressional response to COVID-19 resources for businesses impacted an outlook for GA Ag the defense spending bill & more. #GA08 https://t.co/60rlZsIoB3

This afternoon I joined @agripulse to discuss issues impacting our farm economy and rural America including the congressional response to COVID-19 rural health care and the case for writing a new Farm Bill. You can watch at the link below. https://t.co/npNeSfusGq
I’d like to extend a special “Happy Father’s Day” to all our #GA08 dads especially my dad Jim. https://t.co/7MjBZaMpuD

On June 19 1865 Union soldiers landed at Galveston TX with news that the Civil War had ended and enslaved people were now free two and a half years after the Emancipation Proclamation. Today on Juneteenth we celebrate freedom dignity and the end of slavery in America. https://t.co/KDikhcWXht
Our prayers are with Reps. Andy Barr and Jim Sensenbrenner whose wives both passed this week. We pray for comfort for them and their families friends and staffs during this very difficult time.

For the past 245 years countless men and women have answered the call to serve our nation and fight for the freedoms we enjoy today. Happy Birthday to the @USArmy and to all the Soldiers who have served our country with distinction. https://t.co/6GdiyuTrO2

76 years ago Allied forces bravely stormed the beaches of Normandy to bring liberty and freedom to occupied Europe. Today we remember those brave men who charged forward into darkness to liberate their fellow man from Nazi tyranny. God Bess the Greatest Generation. #DDay76 https://t.co/uxMRp3UNQE

....Only a peaceful movement forces us to move forward.   In the midst of it all we must never forget that we are all God's children - equal in His sight & endowed by Him with the same inalienable rights.  Any violence or destruction has nothing to do with George Floyd.

....I hope that America will focus on the peaceful movement & reflect upon the good we see in it including law enforcement arm-in-arm with those who have come to march.  Only a peaceful movement allows us to celebrate the life & protest the death of George Floyd & others....
The death of George Floyd has led to several peaceful demonstrations across Middle & South Georgia that focus a spotlight on many of the challenges our nation faces....

I am deeply saddened to hear of former Rep. Sam Johnson's passing. Sam was an American patriot & Vietnam POW who served in the U.S. Air Force for 29 yrs & House of Representatives for more than 20 yrs. He was a giant among men who inspired many & our prayers are with his family.

While many are enjoying time with friends and family today let us not forget the real reason for #MemorialDay. Please join me today in honoring those who have made the ultimate sacrifice for our freedoms. God Bless our fallen warfighters and God Bless our great country. 🇺🇸 https://t.co/ZcnWqkSRo4

Official IRS information about the COVID-19 pandemic and economic impact payments can be found on the Coronavirus Tax Relief page at the link below. The page is updated quickly when new information is available. (4/4) https://t.co/2bhUh7Tqo9
Social Security beneficiaries who are not typically required to file tax returns will also automatically receive their payment- no action is needed. (3/4) https://t.co/C7HPzMEHKI

You don't have to sign up to receive an economic impact payment- it is automatic for any American who qualifies. In most cases it'll be distributed how your 2019 tax return is distributed. If you haven't filed your 2019 return yet info from your 2018 return will be used. (2/4)

A coronavirus stimulus package is now on its way to @realDonaldTrump's desk to be signed into law. While this certainly isn’t a perfect bill this package will provide vital resources to health care facilities businesses & American families during this public health emergency.

Yesterday I visited @secondharvest & packed boxes for our South GA neighbors unable to restock essentials. SHSG is also partnering w/ schools to help provide meals to children affected by closures.
